title: wind_turbine_library
description: A collection of the most common wind turbines with information on capacity, power curves and other parameters available from specification sheets

license.name: Open Data Commons Open Database License 1.0
license.instruction: You are free: To Share, To Create, To Adapt; As long as you: Attribute, Share-Alike, Keep open!

contributors.name: Christian Hofmann
contributors.comment: reworked, fixed, added metadata and uploaded everything

fields.name: id
fields.description: unambiguous unique number for table entry

fields.name: turbine_id
fields.description: unambiguous unique number for turbine

fields.name: name
fields.description: Turbine name as in product description of manufacturer

fields.name: turbine_type
fields.description: Turbine name for all manufacturers in a consistent Format

fields.name: installed_capacity
fields.description: installed capacity of turbine

fields.name: rotor_diameter
fields.description: diameter of installed rotor

fields.name: rotor_area
fields.description: Area covered by rotating rotor

fields.name: hub_height
fields.description: Height of turbine hub. Several possible heights separated by semicolon

fields.name: max_speed_drive
fields.description: maximum rotational speed

fields.name: wind_class_iec
fields.description: wind class conforming to IEC Standard

fields.name: wind_zone_dibt
fields.description: Suitable wind zone(s) according to DIBt

fields.name: power_density
fields.description: Nominal power per rotor area

fields.name: power_density_2
fields.description: Reciprocal nominal power per rotor area

fields.name: calculated
fields.description: Boolean information if specifications were calculated rather than measured

fields.name: has_power_curve
fields.description: Boolean information whether power curve is available

fields.name: power_curve_wind_speeds
fields.description: List of wind speeds in accordance with list of values for power curve. The two colums represent the power curve for each turbine

fields.name: power_curve_values
fields.description: List of power values in accordance to wind speeds of power_curve_wind_speeds

fields.name: has_cp_curve
fields.description: Boolean information whether power coefficient curve is available

fields.name: power_coefficient_curve_wind_speeds
fields.description: List of wind speeds in accordance with list of values for power coefficient curve. The two colums represent the power coefficient curve for each turbine

fields.name: power_coefficient_curve_values
fields.description: List of power coefficient values in accordance to wind speeds of power_coefficient_curve_wind_speeds

fields.name: has_ct_curve
fields.description: Boolean information whether thrust coefficient curve is available

fields.name: thrust_coefficient_curve_wind_speeds
fields.description: List of wind speeds in accordance with list of values for thrust coefficient curve. The two colums represent the thrust coefficient curve for each turbine

fields.name: thrust_coefficient_curve_values
fields.description: List of thrust coefficient values in accordance to wind speeds of thrust_coefficient_curve_wind_speeds

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source of the information within a particular row
